name: Netbit.
description:
Netbit is a digital virtual security agent created to protect the network. The player must delete different types of viruses and solve cybersecurity problems through access to the digital world.

A Mystery Dungeon inspired game made with Voxel Art.

• Developed by: Everton Mazepa.
• 2D Art: Alexsandra Ferreira.
• Music: Karugamo.
• Made with: Smile Game Builder.

This game are made for The OFFICIAL Smile Game Builder Summer 2022 Game Jam.
